mapper.select: SELECT cm.m_cletter_cd AS mCletterCd, cm.recruit_job_cd AS recruitJobCd, cm.login_id AS loginId, cm.m_cletter_name AS mCletterName, cm.m_cletter_regdate AS mCletterRegdate, cm.m_cletter_modidate AS mCletterModidate FROM tb_cletter_member cm

SELECT ci.company_name AS companyName, jm.job_midindex_name AS midindexName, rcj.recruit_job_jobdetail AS recruitJobDetail, rc.recruit_enddate AS recruitEnddate, rcj.recruit_job_workstatus AS recruitJobWorkstatus, rcj.recruit_job_file AS recruitJobFile FROM tb_recruit_company rc
INNER JOIN tb_recruit_company_job rcj ON rc.company_cd = rcj.company_cd
INNER JOIN tb_company_info ci ON ci.company_cd = rcj.company_cd
INNER JOIN tb_job_midindex jm ON jm.job_midindex_cd = rcj.job_midindex_cd ORDER BY rc.recruit_enddate ASC

SELECT
ci.company_name AS companyName, jm.job_midindex_name AS midindexName, rcj.recruit_job_jobdetail AS recruitJobDetail, rc.recruit_enddate AS recruitEnddate, ccj.c_cletter_article AS cCletterArticle
FROM tb_recruit_company rc INNER JOIN tb_recruit_company_job rcj ON rc.company_cd = rcj.company_cd INNER JOIN tb_company_info ci ON ci.company_cd = rcj.company_cd INNER JOIN tb_job_midindex jm ON jm.job_midindex_cd = rcj.job_midindex_cd INNER JOIN tb_cletter_company_job ccj ON rcj.recruit_job_cd = ccj.recruit_job_cd WHERE ccj.c_cletter_article_cd = 'coverletter_cd_10'
